Uses of Interface
common.ByteStreamReader

  • Packages that use ByteStreamReader 
    Package Description
    common
    Contains shared foundational utilities for byte-level data handling and low-level operations.
    heif
    Provides high-level classes for parsing and manipulating HEIF-based files.
    heif.boxes
    Classes for parsing and representing individual HEIF-structured boxes.
    tif
    Classes for parsing and manipulating TIFF-based files.
    webp  

    • Uses of ByteStreamReader in common

      Classes in common that implement ByteStreamReader 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ImageRandomAccessReader
      Utility for reading binary data from image files with configurable byte order.
      class  SequentialByteArrayReader
      Performs sequential reading of primitive data types from a byte array.

      Constructor Description
      AuxiliaryTypePropertyBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs an AuxiliaryTypePropertyBox from the box header and content.
      Box(ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs a Box by reading its header from the specified ByteStreamReader.
      CleanApertureBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader) 
      ColourInformationBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs a ColourInformationBox from a parent Box and a byte reader.
      DataEntryBox(Box header, ByteStreamReader reader) 
      DataInformationBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, providing additional information from other contained boxes, specifically dref - Data Reference Box and its nested contained boxes, where further additional information on URL location and name is provided.
      DataReferenceBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader) 
      FileTypeBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs a FileTypeBox, parsing its fields from the specified ByteStreamReader.
      FullBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs a FullBox by extending a standard Box header with version and flags data.
      HandlerBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, extending the super class FullBox to provide more specific information about this box.
      ImageMirrorBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object whose aim is to mirror the image either vertically or horizontally about its axis.
      ImageRotationBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object whose aim is to retrieve the angle (in anti-clockwise direction) in units of degrees.
      ImageSpatialExtentsProperty(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object whose aim is to gather information both on width and height of the associated image item.
      ItemDataBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, providing additional data of metadata items.
      ItemInfoEntry(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Parses an ItemInfoEntry from the specified reader.
      ItemInformationBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Parses the ItemInformationBox from the specified reader.
      ItemLocationBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemLocationBox by parsing the provided iloc box data.
      ItemPropertiesBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemPropertiesBox by reading the ipco (property container) and one or more ipma (item-property association) boxes.
      ItemPropertyAssociationBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemPropertyAssociationBox object, parsing its structure from the specified ByteStreamReader.
      ItemPropertyContainerBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemPropertyContainerBox resource by reading sequential boxes.
      ItemReferenceBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemReferenceBox, reading its references from the specified ByteStreamReader stream.
      MetaBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs a MetaBox, parsing its fields from the specified ByteStreamReader.
      PixelAspectRatioBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader) 
      PixelInformationBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs a PixelInformationBox by parsing the specified box header and its content.
      PrimaryItemBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader)
      Constructs a PrimaryItemBox, reading its fields from the specified ByteStreamReader parameter.
      SingleItemTypeReferenceBox(Box box, ByteStreamReader reader, int version)
      Constructs a SingleItemTypeReferenceBox by reading its fields from the specified stream.
